description: This dataset provides a list of websites, blogs, wikis, Twitter feeds, and Facebook pages associated with neighborhood-specific groups and organizations. To add a new site visit http://www.seattle.gov/communitiesonline/addform.htm/jmzd-2qjz

metadata.attribution: Community Technology, Department of Information Technology, City of Seattle

name: Seattle Communities Online Inventory
